about

I'm a self-taught Front-End developer with a passion for programming and new technologies.

I build responsive and functional websites with the latest design and technology trends, while paying great attention to details.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

my work

myteam

Where in the world?

Shortly

myteam

"myteam" is a Frontend Mentor coding challenge.
The challenge was to make the website look as close to the design as possible for smartphone, tablet, and desktop, as well as adding a client-side form validation.

Source code View website

Where in the world?

"Where in the world?" is a Frontend Mentor coding challenge. The challenge was to display countries information by using the REST Countries API, to filter countries by region, to look for a specific country, and to choose between a dark and a light mode.

Source code View website

Shortly

"Shortly" is a Frontend Mentor coding challenge. The challenge was to make the website look as close to the design as possible for smartphone, tablet, and desktop. To add an URL shortener by using shrtcode API, and to allow the user to copy the shortened link, by simply clicking on a button.

Source code View website
